A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay as a standalone movie... but that doesn't make up for the fact it destroyed the Star Wars franchise; and my love of the Star Wars universe.   I use to love all the  characters from old\, but the way Rian J. desecrates Luke's legacy... makes us all hate any reference to Skywalker or the characters of  old.  \n\nI don't connect with  any of the new rebels or badarses  (I found Snoke interesting... but he is gone as well).   I guess the Star War saga isn't being produced for the sci-fi fans anymore...
